thread.section_title: Library Hotel by Library Hotel Collection - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Best Hotel - Hands Down
thread.title_full: Best Hotel - Hands Down - Review of Library Hotel by Library Hotel Collection, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: LySaundra
title: Best Hotel - Hands Down
text: From booking until check out, the staff at the Library Hotel were incredibly helpful and hospitable. The price is quite reasonable for all you get in return - including a book upon check in, complimentary breakfast, evening receptions, turndown, assistance with booking transportation, and excellent knowledge of nice restaurants in the area.
